articles.title: Pac-12 bowl projections: USC, the New Year’s Six and four scenarios for the stretch run - The Mercury News
articles.description: The Trojans could represent the Pac-12 in the playoff or drop into the Alamo or Holiday bowls, depending on how they fare against Notre Dame and in the conference championship.
articles.content:
